channel.title: Phone Cell Insane Friendster on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: oh yea
item.description: last night was pretty fun. seriouly. I posted a bulletin from my cell phone on friendster. it is pretty insane. love opera. yea I went to a pretty dope party last night called “motherfucker” - haha. it was nice a lot of pretty people. a lot of platform shoes. a ass load of pictures. that will be posted. hehe. two cameras. one of with me. and one with jordan. it is gunna rule.
